listitem.para: Creates a static text control. A static control is used to simply display text. The term "static control" is somewhat misleading because a static control can be dynamically updated by with STATICUPDATE.
The parent input is the name of the window that will own the new static control.
The name input identifies the new static control and MUST be a unique word.
The text input is a word that will be written on the static control.
The xpos input is the X coordinate where the upper left-hand corner of the new static control is placed.
The ypos input is the Y coordinate where the upper left-hand corner of the new static control is placed.
The width input is the width of the new static control, in pixels.
The height input is the height of the new static control, in pixels.

programlisting.userinput:
; create a static in a new window: WINDOWCREATE "main "mywindow "mytitle 0 0 100 100 [] STATICCREATE "mywindow "mystatic [Heading=0] 25 25 50 25 REPEAT 72 [RIGHT 5 STATICUPDATE "mystatic SENTENCE [Heading=] HEADING WAIT 60] WINDOWDELETE "mywindow
; create a static on graphics window: STATICCREATE "main "mystatic [Heading=0] 25 25 100 50 REPEAT 72 [RIGHT 5 STATICUPDATE "mystatic SENTENCE [Heading=] HEADING WAIT 60] WINDOWDELETE "mywindow
